query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fca_podcasts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  audioUrl TEXT,
  thumbnailUrl TEXT,
  duration INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  episodeNumber INT NOT NULL,
  season INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  host VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT 'Chad A. Dozier' NOT NULL,
  guest VARCHAR(255),
  publishDate DATE NOT NULL,
  featured ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'no' NOT NULL,
  transcript TEXT,
  plays INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  likes INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  downloads INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  audioUrl TEXT,
  thumbnailUrl TEXT,
  duration INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  episodeNumber INT NOT NULL,
  season INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  host VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT 'Chad A. Dozier' NOT NULL,
  guest VARCHAR(255),
  publishDate DATE NOT NULL,
  featured ENUM('yes', 'no') DEFAULT 'no' NOT NULL,
  transcript TEXT,
  plays INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  likes INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  downloads INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
